            About Me
            I am a researcher at MDRC
            based in San Francisco and study inequality.
            I graduated with a B.A. at the intersection of sociology,
            ethnic studies, and history from Duke University. It is
            titled: Constructions
            of Race and Racial Attitudes in the United
            States.
            Outside of research, I love going to concerts, reading,
            and exploring the Bay Area’s amazing scenery.
